Class Circle

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.games.physics_game.physics.RigidBody
edu.uky.games.physics_game.physics.Circle
public class Circle extends RigidBody
A rigid circular or ball shape.

Stephen G. Ware

    • getNormal

      public Vector getNormal(RigidBody other)
      Description copied from class: RigidBody
      Returns a normal vector which is perpendicular to the plane between this body and the given body. The normal vector returned will be a unit vector and it will point toward this body.
      Specified by:
      getNormal in class RigidBody
      Parameters:
      other - the other body
      Returns:
      the normal unit vector
